channel.title: Tech on PowerUp ☆ Video Game & Technology Resource
channel.description: Recent content in Tech on PowerUp ☆ Video Game & Technology Resource

item.title: Mechanical Keyboards
item.description:
CM Storm Quick Fire Rapid
Rapid-i, Stealth, TK, XT, Ultimate
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green
CM Storm NovaTouch
Ultra smooth, Hybrid Capacitive switches.
Cherry MX Compatible Key Stems.
CM Masterkeys Pro S
Switch: Blue, Brown, Red
RGB Lighting with 16.7 million colors.
Macros and profile support.
Corsair K70 Rapidfire
Switch: Blue, Brown, Red
Multi color, per key backlighting.
Corsair Utility Engine software.
Corsair K65
Switch: Red
Smooth, linear key response for ultra fast double and triple taps without the audible click.
Corsair STRAFE RGB
Switch: Blue, Brown, Red
Multi-color dynamic RGB backlighting. Fully programmable, reassign any key.
Das Keyboard 4
Switch: Blue, Brown
German-engineered, gold-plated mechanical switches. Laser etched key inscriptions.
Das Keyboard 4C Professional
Switch: Blue, Brown
Greetech switches with gold contacts. Dedicated Windows key disable control for better gaming.
Das Division Zero X40 Pro
Alpha-Zulu Tactile mechanical gaming switches.
5 programmable macro gaming keys.
Interchangeable aluminum top panel.
Ducky Legend
Switch: Blue, Brown, Red
Full size, great for gaming and typing.
Ducky Mini
Switch: Blue, Brown, Red
Includes mouse functionality that allows you keep your hands on the keyboard.
Ducky One
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green, White
Designed with narrower bezel. Double-shot key caps. Single Color LED with backlighting effects.
Ducky Premier
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green, White
Keyboard for typing purists. Printed with dye-sumlimation process which will never wear out.
Ducky Shine
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green, White
ABS double shot backlit keycaps. Uses a removable feet design. Backlighting effects.
Ducky Zero
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green, White
Enthusiast grade keyboard. Includes the 2108, 2108L, 2108S, 2108SZ, 2087, & 2087S models.
Filco Ninja Majestouch-2
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red
Steel mounted in a rock solid body.
Front printed keys.
Happy Hacking Keyboard Professional 2
Topre Capacitive Switches. Ultra compact. Alternative key layout. Control key is in Caps Lock position. PBT keycaps.
IBM Model M
A group of keyboards manufactured by IBM starting in 1984. Buckling-spring key design. Regarded as timeless and durable.
Leopold FC500R
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red
Full-sized, featuring an no-nonsense design. Detachable cable and angled rubber feet.
Leopold FC660M Mini
Switch: Brown, Red, Green, Gray Linear/Tactile
PBT keycaps. Keyboard mode selection dip-switch. Swappable CTRL/CAPS Lock keys.
Noppoo Choc Mini
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red
Multi-Media Keys over QWEASD section. Swappable CTRL/CAPS Lock keys. WIN key lock.
Razer BlackWidow TE
Razer Switches: Clicky X, Clicky, Stealth
Tournament Edition. Fully programmable keys with on-the-fly macro recording and 10 key rollover.
Razer BlackWidow X Chroma
Razer Switches: Clicky X, Clicky, Stealth
Individually programmable backlit keys with on-the-fly macro recording and 10 key rollover.
Razer BlackWidow X Ultimate
Razer Switches: Clicky X, Clicky, Stealth
Individually programmable backlit keys with 5 dynamic lighting options and 10 key rollover.
ROCCAT RYOS MK Pro
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red
Per Key Illumination. Two 32-bit ARM Cortex processors. Achievements Display.
ROCCAT Suora
Frameless design. Robust, compact build with aluminum alloy housing. Breathing mode plus 11-level brightness.
Rosewill RK-9000V2
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown
Game-mode, Anti-ghosting, Multimedia Keys, Windows Lock. Laser printed keycaps.
Topre RealForce 87U
Switch: Topre Capacitive Tactile
Integrated Ten-key Numberpad. Swappable CTRL/CAPS Lock keys. Onboard dip-switches.
Topre RealForce 104U
Switch: Topre Capacitive Tactile
Minimized fatigue for users, even after extended use. Also available in 104UG.
Topre Type Heaven
Switch: Topre Capacitive Tactile
Gold Lasered US/English Legends. Quiet operation and a smooth key touch.
Unicomp Ultra Classic
Switch: Buckling Spring
Newly designed clamshell cover set reducing eliminating almost ½ pound of plastic.
Unicomp EnduraPro
Switch: Buckling Spring
UltraClassic with an integrated pointing stick mouse. Available in White & Black and USB or PS/2.
Unicomp Mac Spacesaver M
Switch: Buckling Spring
Configured specifically for Mac users. Convenient control for system, audio and applications.
Vortex KBC Poker 3
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green, Clear
Arbitrary programming, 3 layers customization, Qwerty, Dvorak, Colemak layout.
Vortex KBT Race
Switch: Blue, Brown, Red
ABS backlit and PTB non-backlit keycap versions. PTB Recommended.
Vortex KBT Pure
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, White
LED Backlit, Laser Etched ABS or Pad Printed keycaps. 60% compact design.
WASD V2 104-Key
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green, Clear
Available in several different models. Support for multiple keyboard layouts.
WASD V2 87-Key
Switch: Black, Blue, Brown, Red, Green, Clear
Available in several differnt models. Support for multiple keyboard layouts.
WASD VP3 61-Key
Switch:Blue, Brown, Red, Clear
Compact 60% design. All metal case. 3 dipswitch selectable keyboard layouts.

Cherry MX Switches

Black
Linear
60g Actuation force
Red
Linear
45g Actuation force
Blue
Tactile & Clicky
50g Actuation force
Green
Tactile & Clicky
80g Actuation force
Brown
Tactile
45g Actuation force
Clear
Tactile
55g Actuation force

item.title: Mice
item.description:
Gaming

ASUS GX950
Laser, Avago 9800 sensor, 50-8200dpi, Profile-switch button, Adjustable weights, 5 buttons.
ASUS GX1000
Laser, Avago 9800 sensor, 50-8200dpi, Adjustable weights, 6 programmable macros, 3 function slots.
ASUS ROG Spatha
Laser, Avago 9800 sensor, 50-8200dpi, 150 ips, 30g acceleration, 2000Hz USB polling rate, 12 buttons.
ASUS ROG Gladius
Optical, Avago S3988 sensor, 6400dpi, Detachable cable, Omron switches.
CM Storm Spawn
Optical, Avago 3090 sensor, 3500dpi, 60 ips, 20g accelertion, 7 buttons.
CM Storm Xornet II
Optical, Avago 3320 sensor, 3500dpi, 80 ips, 20g accelertion, 7 buttons.
CM Storm Havoc
Optical, Avago 9800 sensor, 8200dpi, 150 ips, 30g accelertion, 8 buttons.
CM Storm Sentinel III
Optical, Avago 3988 sensor, 6400dpi, 200 ips, 50g accelertion, 8 buttons.
Corsair SABRE
Optical, 8200dpi, High-performance switches, 100g total weight, 8 buttons.
Corsair Katar
Optical, 100-8000dpi, On-the-fly dpi tuning, 4 buttons.
Corsair Scimitar
Optical, 12,000dpi, Key Slider control system, 12 mechanical side buttons.
Corsair Vengeance M95
Also in M65. Laser, 8200dpi, Omron D2FC-F switches, Selectable response time, 15 buttons.
Ducky Secret
Optical, Pixart PMW3310DH Sensor, 400-5000dpi, NXP 32-bit ARM MCU, Omron Switches, PBT.
EVGA Torq X10
Also in X3 & X5 models. Laser, 8200dpi, Real Carbon Fiber surface, Omron switches, Adjustable weights, 9 buttons.
Finalmouse Classic Ergo
Optical, Pixart 3310 IR Led Esports Sensor, 400-3200dpi, Omron switches, 3 buttons.
Finalmouse Tournament Pro
Optical, Pixart 3310 IR Led Esports Sensor, 400-3200dpi, Omron switches, 3 buttons.
Logitech G9X
Laser, 5700dpi, Avago S9500 sensor, 30g acceleration, 2 scroll modes, Adjustable weights.
Logitech G303
Optical, PMW3366 sensor, 200-12,000dpi, Metal spring button tensioning.
Logitech G400s
Optical, Avago S3095 Sensor, 400-4000dpi, 140ips, 25g acceleration, 8 buttons.
Logitech G402
Optical, AM010 sensor, 32-bit ARM processor, 240-4000dpi, 500ips, >16g acceleration, 8 buttons.
Logitech G500s
Laser, Avago S9808 sensor, 200-8200dpi, 80-160 ips, Adjustable weights, 10 buttons.
Logitech G502
Optical, PMW3366 sensor, 32-bit ARM, 12,000dpi, 300 ips, 40g acceleration, Adjustable weights, 11 buttons.
Logitech G602
Wireless, Optical, Delta Zero sensor, 250-2500dpi, 80 ips, 20g acceleration, 250 hours battery life, 11 buttons.
Logitech G900
Wired/Wireless, Laser, PMW3366 sensor, 32-bit ARM, 12,000dpi, 300 ips, 40g acceleration, 11 buttons.
Mad Catz R.A.T.9
Also in 3, 5, 7, M, Pro models.
Laser, Wireless, 6400dpi, Adjustable weights, 11 buttons, Rechargeable.
Mionix Castor
Optical, 32bit ARM processor, 10,000dpi, Adjustable lift off disance,
6 buttons.
Mionix NAOS 8200
Also in 3200 & 7000 models. Laser, 32bit ARM processor, 8200dpi, Adjustable polling rate, 7 buttons.
Mionix AVIOR 8200
Also in 7000 and SK models. Laser, 32bit ARM processor, 8200dpi, 150ips, 30g acceleration, 9 buttons.
Razer Mamba
Several models. Laser, 16,000dpi, 210ips, 50g acceleration, 9 buttons, Personalized click feedback.
Razer Naga
Wired/Wireless, Laser, 8200dpi, 200ips, 50g acceleration, 12 Mechanical side buttons.
Razer DeathAdder
Several models. Optical, 10,000dpi, 200ips, 50g acceleration, 5 buttons, Chroma lighting.
Razer Ouroboros
Wireless, Laser, 8200dpi, 200ips, 50g acceleration, 11 buttons.
ROCCAT KOVA
Optical, Pro-Optic R2 sensor, Easy-Shift button dupliactor, 3200dpi, 130ips, 30g acceleration, 7 buttons.
ROCCAT Nyth
Laser, Turbo Core V2 32-bit ARM-based MCU, 12,000dpi, 150ips, 50g acceleration, 33 buttons.
ROCCAT Kone
Laser, Pro-Aim Sensor R2, Turbo Core V2 32-bit Arm-based MCU, 6000dpi, 150-200ips, 30g acceleration.
ROCCAT Tyon
Laser, Pro-Aim Sensor R3, Turbo Core V2 Arm-based MCU, Thumb paddle, 8200dpi, 150ips, 30g acceleration.
SHARKK
Optical, 3500dpi, 1000Hz polling rate, 7 buttons, Low-friction Teflon feet.
SHARKK Laser
Laser, 16,400dpi, Adjustable weights, Omron Micro Switches, 14 buttons.
SteelSeries Rival 700
Laser & Optical, 16,000dpi, 500ips, 50g acceleration, Adjustable weights, OLED display, Tactile alerts, 7 buttons.
SteelSeries Sensei
Wired & Wireless, Laser, 8200dpi, 150ips, 30g acceleration, 8 buttons.
Zowie AM
Optical, Avago 3090 sensor, 400-2300dpi, 5 buttons.
Zowie EC1-A
Also EC2-A model. Optical, Avago 3310 sensor, 3200dpi, 180ips, 5 buttons.
Zowie FK1
Also FK2 model. Optical, Avago 3310 sensor, 400-3200dpi, 200ips, 5 buttons.
Zowie ZA11
Also ZA12 & AZ13 models.
Optical, Avago 3310 sensor, 400-3200dpi, 200ips, 5 buttons.
